message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this valuable product to you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a deal. My initial offer is $1200000 for the product. I'm confident that it's a fair price considering its worth to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1400000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After reconsidering the value of the product, I'm willing to meet you halfway. My counteroffer is $1300000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
